name: Informa Investment Solutions
overview: Informa Investment Solutions, Inc. develops and markets financial software and services for financial institutions, brokerages, investment management companies, investment consultants, and advisors. It offers Wealth Management Systems, such as PSN Enterprise, a manager search application; M-Pact for investment planning; ComplianceIQ that provides a scalable and active monitoring solution for the management of discretionary or custodial accounts; and InsuranceIQ, which enables trustees to manage risk and fiduciary responsibilities. The company also provides data management software for managed accounts, mutual funds, and hedge funds; report and research tools that measure performance and analyze portfolios; and wealth management, asset allocation, and investment proposal applications. In addition, it offers solutions for data management, due diligence compliance, portfolio accounting and performance measurement, investment research and evaluation, and investment and financial planning, wealth management. Informa Investment Solutions, Inc. was formerly known as Effron Enterprises, Inc. and changed its name to Informa Investment Solutions, Inc. in January, 2004. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in White Plains, New York. Informa Investment Solutions, Inc. is a subsidiary of Informa Financial Information, Inc.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President and Head of PSN/Research business unit

acquisitions.source_description: Informa to acquire Investment Scorecard, Inc.(Informa Investment Solutions)(Brief article)
